import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Link, LinkService} from "../services/link/link.service"; import {HostListener} from "@angular/core"; import {fromEvent, map, Observable} from "rxjs"; @Component({ selector: 'app-tab2', templateUrl: 'tab2.page.html', styleUrls: ['tab2.page.scss'] }) export class Tab2Page { links: Link[] = []; activateGoTop: boolean; constructor( private linkService: LinkService ) { this.linkService.links$.subscribe(links => { this.links = links; }) this.activateGoTop = false; } openJoke(link: Link){ this.linkService.linkDetail = link; } async removeLink(index:any){ await this.linkService.removeLink(index); this.links.splice(index,1); } @HostListener('window:scroll',[]) onWindowScroll() { if ( window.scrollY > 100 ) { this.activateGoTop = true; } else { this.activateGoTop = false; } } scrollToTop(){ return window.scrollTo(0,0); } }
